apptext.appdescription: Welcome to the KitchenAid Qualifier tool!
apptext.oneLastStep: One Last Step: Adjust your price to find your perfect
apptext.changeYourAnswer: Click on an icon to change your answer
apptext.emailSubject: I found the perfect {{appliance}} and wanted to share with you
apptext.emailMessage:
Finding the right appliance is hard. But I used {{brand}}'s new tool to answer a few simple questions and found the perfect {{appliance}} for my lifestyle. I wanted to share my results with you and also the link so you can explore, too!

Try it for yourself here: {{link}}
apptext.facebookTitle: WANT TO CHOOSE THE PERFECT APPLIANCE?
apptext.facebookDesc: We know that appliance shopping can be hard. Our new, simple tool helps you pick the perfect product with features that suit your needs.
apptext.twitterDesc: We know that appliance shopping can be hard. Our new, simple tool helps you pick the perfect product with features that suit your needs.

text.question: What can we help you find?

Which product would
you like to explore first?
WHAT SIZE OF COOKTOP DO YOU NEED?
text.question_full: WHAT SIZE OF COOKTOP DO YOU NEED?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about size?
text.explanation: Our cooktops come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question:
HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE
YOUR KITCHEN'S STYLE?
text.question_full: HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE YOUR KITCHEN'S STYLE?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Our cooktops come in different styles. By understanding your preference, we can better recommend the perfect one for you.

text.question:
WHEN SHOPPING FOR A COOKTOP, WHAT FEATURES
ARE MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.question_full: WHEN SHOPPING FOR A COOKTOP, WHAT FEATURES ARE MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.sub_question: DRAG TO REORDER. 1 IS MOST IMPORTANT AND 5 IS LEAST
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about preference?
text.explanation: By understanding your cooking priorities, we can better recommend the perfect cooktop for your lifestyle.

text.question: WHAT COOKING TECHNIQUES DO YOU USE OFTEN?
text.question_full: WHAT COOKING TECHNIQUES DO YOU USE OFTEN?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking techniques?
text.explanation: Our cooktops are equipped with heat technology to go from simmer to rolling boil quickly. By understanding how you cook, we can better recommend the perfect cooktop for your lifestyle.

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.question_full: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fuel type?
text.explanation: Some kitchens are equipped for gas and others are not. We need to know this information to recommend the perfect range.

text.question:
WHAT IS THE WIDTH
OF YOUR COOKTOP OR RANGE?
text.question_full: WHAT IS THE WIDTH OF YOUR COOKTOP OR RANGE?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about width?
text.explanation: When it comes to cooktops, size matters. It is only once we know the width of your cooktop/range we can find the best vent for you.

text.question:
WHERE IN YOUR KITCHEN CAN
WE FIND YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.question_full: WHERE IN YOUR KITCHEN CAN WE FIND YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me where I cook?
text.explanation: We know that every kitchen is unique. By understanding where your cooking surface is, we can recommend the perfect vent.

text.question:
ARE THERE CABINETS ABOVE
YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.question_full: ARE THERE CABINETS ABOVE YOUR COOKING SURFACE?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my cabinets?
text.explanation: Some of the by-products of cooking (steam, moisture and grease) can be destructive without the right ventilation. By understanding your specific needs we can find the perfect system for your kitchen.

text.question:
DO YOU OFTEN FIND YOURSELF PREPARING
A HIGH-HEAT SAUCE, SAUTÉ OR STIR-FRY?
text.question_full: DO YOU OFTEN FIND YOURSELF PREPARING A HIGH-HEAT SAUCE, SAUTÉ OR STIR-FRY?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about heat?
text.explanation: We know that everybody has a different cooking style. If you like to turn up the heat, we’ll find you a vent with a stronger fan.

text.question:
DOES YOUR VENTILATION LEAD
TO YOUR HOME EXTERIOR?
text.question_full: DOES YOUR VENTILATION LEAD TO YOUR HOME EXTERIOR?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about ventilation?
text.explanation: As much as we want to maintain the smell of that simmering pot of soup, proper ventilation is important to keep kitchen air clean.

text.question:
DO YOU EVER FORGET
TO TURN ON YOUR FAN?
text.question_full: DO YOU EVER FORGET TO TURN ON YOUR FAN?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my habits?
text.explanation: Some of our vents are automatic which means if you need us to, we can give you a hand turning it on.

text.question:
WOULD YOU LIKE YOUR HOOD
TO HAVE A WARMING LAMP?
text.question_full: WOULD YOU LIKE YOUR HOOD TO HAVE A WARMING LAMP?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about a warming lamp?
text.explanation: Some of our models come equipped with warming lamps. If we have a better idea of your needs, we can better recommend the perfect hood.

text.question:
WHAT SIZE OF WALL OVEN
DO YOU NEED?
text.question_full: WHAT SIZE OF WALL OVEN DO YOU NEED?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about size?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question:
WHAT PREFERENCE DO YOU
HAVE FOR YOUR WALL OVEN?
text.question_full: WHAT PREFERENCE DO YOU HAVE FOR YOUR WALL OVEN?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about orientation?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens come in different orientation options. We want to get a better idea of your preference so that we can recommend the perfect one for your home.

text.question: I use my wall oven to...
text.question_full: I use my wall oven to...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use yours so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

answers.text: Cook meals for my busy family
Help me host parties and cook multi-course meals
Bake, bake and bake some more

text.question: HOW WOULD YOUR FRIENDS DESCRIBE YOU?
text.question_full: HOW WOULD YOUR FRIENDS DESCRIBE YOU?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking?
text.explanation: Our wall ovens all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect wall oven for your cooking needs.

answers.subtext:
scallop ceviche and naan pizzas,
I love trying new recipes

I should probably start
my own food blog

my stack of take-out
menus is impressive

text.question:
How important is energy
efficiency to your household?
text.question_full: How important is energy efficiency to your household?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines are different, just like the families they're for. If we can understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect wall oven to fit your needs.

text.question: WHAT SIZE OF RANGE DO YOU NEED?
text.question_full: WHAT SIZE OF RANGE DO YOU NEED?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about size?
text.explanation: Our ranges come in different sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question: I use my range to...
text.question_full: I use my range to...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking?
text.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use yours so we can recommend the perfect one for your needs.

answers.text: Cook meals for my busy family

Help me host multi-
cousre dinners parties
Bake, bake and bake some more

text.question:
What cooking techniques
do you use often?
text.question_full: What cooking techniques do you use often?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking performance?
text.explanation: Our ranges are equipped with heat technology to go from simmer to rolling boil quickly. By understanding how you cook, we can better recommend the perfect range for your lifestyle.

text.question:
WHAT IS THE LARGEST ITEM
THAT YOU REGULARLY COOK?
text.question_full: WHAT IS THE LARGEST ITEM THAT YOU REGULARLY COOK?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
text.explanation: Our ranges come in different sizes and also have unique capacities. If we can understand how you use your range, we can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

text.question: Why do you cook?
text.question_full: Why do you cook?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking?
text.explanation: All our ranges have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use your range so we can recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

answers.text:
From roasts to Mexican night,
my family depends on me to make dinner

I love entertaining guests and need a
range that can handle feasts for a crowd

I’m always trying new dishes and
need a range that can handle variety

Cook? We rely on our impressive
collection of take-out menus

text.question: What style range do you prefer?
text.question_full: What style range do you prefer?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Our ranges come in different styles. By understanding your preference, we can better recommend the perfect one for you.

text.question: HOW WOULD YOUR FRIENDS DESCRIBE YOU?
text.question_full: HOW WOULD YOUR FRIENDS DESCRIBE YOU?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about cooking?
text.explanation: Our ranges all have unique features. We want to get a better idea of how you use it so we can recommend the perfect range for your cooking needs.

answers.subtext:
scallop ceviche and naan pizzas,
I love trying new recipes

I should probably start
my own food blog

my stack of take-out
menus is impressive

text.question:
HOW OFTEN DO YOU FIND YOURSELF COOKING
A MEAT DISH THAT REQUIRES A PRECISE TEMPERATURE?
text.question_full: HOW OFTEN DO YOU FIND YOURSELF COOKING A MEAT DISH THAT REQUIRES A PRECISE TEMPERATURE?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about temperature precision?
text.explanation: Did you know that some of our ranges are equipped with thermometer probes? This technology gives you precision results to notify you when your dish has reached completion.

scale:
Never
I use time to figure out if my dish is done

Sometimes
a few times a year

Very often
I'm always experimenting with new roast recipes

Never
I use time to figure out if my dish is done

Sometimes

text.question: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.question_full: Is your kitchen equipped for gas or electric?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about fuel type?
text.explanation: Some kitchens are equipped with a gas line. We need to know this information to recommend the perfect range.

text.question:
WHAT ARE YOUR REFRIGERATOR'S
HEIGHT AND WIDTH RESTRICTIONS?
text.question_full: WHAT ARE YOUR REFRIGERATOR'S HEIGHT AND WIDTH RESTRICTIONS?
text.sub_question: Please slide and click to answer
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about size?
text.explanation: Our fridges come in many sizes, we want to make sure that we recommend the perfect one for your space.

text.question:
HOW IMPORTANT IS ENERGY
EFFICIENCY TO YOUR HOUSEHOLD?
text.question_full: HOW IMPORTANT IS ENERGY EFFICIENCY TO YOUR HOUSEHOLD?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our appliances are different just like the people they're for. If we understand your energy usage, then we can better recommend the perfect fridge to fit your needs.

text.question: I COUNT ON MY FRIDGE TO HOLD FOOD FOR…
text.question_full: I COUNT ON MY FRIDGE TO HOLD FOOD FOR…
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
text.explanation: We want to get a better idea of how you use your fridge and what you put in it so we can find you the one that fits your lifestyle.

scale:
Myself
to keep me fueled all week

Me and my better half
we like to try new recipes together

My Family
from Mexican night to smörgåsbord Sundays, we're a hungry group

My large family
the cooking never ends, but we love creating new family classics

My dinner party guests
I'm the host with the most

text.question: I count on my fridge to…
text.question_full: I count on my fridge to…
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about how I use my fridge?
text.explanation: Our fridges are carefully designed from the inside out. By better learning what you put in your fridge, it will help us recommend the right one for your lifestyle.

answers.text:
Chill the drinks –
from cold press juices to wine

Store fresh produce
from the farmers’ market

Hold everything that we
bought from the grocery store

Store platters of food for
dinner parties and holidays

text.question:
Does your kitchen have
an existing waterline?
text.question_full: Does your kitchen have an existing waterline?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about a waterline?
text.explanation: Did you know that your kitchen needs a waterline in order for your fridge to dispense water? Some of our models provide water-dispensing features. By understanding how you consume water, we can recommend a fridge that will best suit your needs.

answers.text:
Yes - my kitchen has a waterline
and my fridge dispenses water and ice

No - I dont have a waterline
and don't need one

No - I don't have a waterline but
would consider installing one so our
fridge could dispense water and ice

text.question: I like to add ice to...
text.question_full: I like to add ice to...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about ice?
text.explanation: Did you know that your kitchen needs a waterline in order for your fridge to dispense ice? Some of our models provide ice-dispensing features. By understanding how you consume ice, we can recommend a fridge that will fit your lifestyle.

text.question: I want my kitchen to look like this...
text.question_full: I want my kitchen to look like this...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Since some fridges are built deeper than typical counter depth, we need to know how important having a fridge that's in-line with your counters is to your purchasing decision.

answers.subtext: I want to be able to customize the exterior of my fridge
I want my fridge to be in-line with my counters
I don’t care if my fridge is in-line with my counters

text.question:
How do you shop
for your groceries?
text.question_full: How do you shop for your groceries?
text.explanation_title: Why are you ask me about groceries?
text.explanation: Our fridges are designed with unique features. By understanding how you shop, we learn more about how you use your fridge and can better recommend the perfect one for your lifestyle.

answers.text:
I’m on a first-name basis
at the farmers’ market

I get basics and produce
from the grocery store
I go aisle-to-aisle at the grocery store
Stock up in the frozen food section

text.question:
What would we find inside your
dishwasher right now?
text.question_full: What would we find inside your dishwasher right now?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me what I wash?
text.explanation: Knowing what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to recommend an option that ensures every dish gets a fresh start.

answers.text:
Wine glasses from
all my closest friends

Cutting boards of
every shape and size

text.question:
How many times a week do
you run the dishwasher?
text.question_full: How many times a week do you run the dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about capacity?
text.explanation: When it comes to washing your dishes there is no job too big or too small. Understanding what goes into your dishwasher will allow us to find the perfect fit for you.

text.question:
WHEN SHOPPING FOR A DISHWASHER, WHAT FEATURES ARE
MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.question_full: WHEN SHOPPING FOR A DISHWASHER, WHAT FEATURES ARE MOST IMPORTANT TO YOUR PURCHASE DECISION?
text.sub_question: DRAG TO REORDER. 1 IS MOST IMPORTANT AND 6 IS LEAST
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about preference?
text.explanation: By understanding your dishwashing priorities, we can better recommend a dishwasher with features that suit your lifestyle.

text.question:
HOW IMPORTANT IS ENERGY
EFFICIENCY TO YOUR HOUSEHOLD?
text.question_full: HOW IMPORTANT IS ENERGY EFFICIENCY TO YOUR HOUSEHOLD?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about energy?
text.explanation: All of our machines use energy differently. By understanding your energy use, it will help us find the machine that best fits your lifestyle.

text.question: When do you run your dishwasher?
text.question_full: When do you run your dishwasher?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about start time?
text.explanation: Much like each of your guests, dishwashers have different sound profiles. By understanding your start time we can determine which machine suits you best.

answers.text: Before I head out in the morning

text.question: Do you live in an open concept space?
text.question_full: Do you live in an open concept space?
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about my space?
text.explanation: If you live in an open concept space, we want to take that into consideration to recommend the perfect machine to keep the noise at a minimum.

answers.text: Yes - My kitchen opens on to another room
No - My kitchen is its own room

text.question:
Before running
our dishwasher, it is...
text.question_full: Before running our dishwasher, it is...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about organization?
text.explanation: After assessing your technique we can suggest ways to optimize organization for your home.

text.question: Select your style preference...
text.question_full: Select your style preference...
text.explanation_title: Why are you asking me about style?
text.explanation: Finding the perfect fit for your home's style is as important for us as it is for you.
